description: Arsenal transfer rumours: Mathys Tel, Kieran Tierney, Ollie Watkins
title: Arsenal transfer rumours: Mathys Tel, Kieran Tierney, Ollie Watkins
title_page: Arsenal transfer rumours: Mathys Tel, Kieran Tierney, Ollie Watkins - BBC Sport
maintext:
Tottenham have agreed a Â£50m deal with Bayern Munich for 19-year-old forward Mathys Tel, who is also being targeted by Arsenal. (L'Equipe - in French), external
However, Tel would prefer a move to Manchester United over Arsenal, Chelsea or Spurs, so he is waiting to see if interest is concrete before making a decision. (i Sport), external
Meanwhile, England striker Ollie Watkins would be open to joining Arsenal this month, but Aston Villa are determined to keep the 29-year-old. (Mail), external
Finally, Arsenal have blocked 27-year-old left-back Kieran Tierney from bringing forward a summer move to Celtic. (Telegraph - subscription required), external
Want more transfer stories? Read Friday's full gossip column
